official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to permit flexible billing and payment arrangements where a physician substitutes on an occasional basis for another physician in solo practice.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to permit payment to be made to a physician in the solo practice of medicine who arranges for physicians' services to be provided by another physician on an occasional basis in certain situations.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to permit flexible billing and payment arrangements where a physician substitutes on an occasional basis for another physician in solo practice.
